meanings.definition: A woman who has given birth to more than one child.
meanings.sent1: The hospital keeps track of the number of multiparae in their maternity ward.
meanings.sent2: The support group for multiparae meets every Thursday to share experiences.
meanings.sent3: The multiparae at the baby shower had plenty of advice for the first-time moms.
meanings.sent4: She navigated motherhood with the ease of a seasoned multiparae.
meanings.sent5: The multiparae's love for her children was evident in every smile and hug.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a woman who has given birth to more than one child.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained the benefits of the multiparae prenatal vitamins.
meanings.sent2: Her multiparae status influenced her decision to choose a midwife for her delivery.
meanings.sent3: The multiparae-friendly hospital room had extra space for siblings to visit.
meanings.sent4: Her nurturing nature was a multiparae trait that she inherited from her mother.
meanings.sent5: The multiparae charm of the nursery made it a cozy haven for the newborn.
